channel.title: CVE Feed for Universal Software Inc. -- FlexWater Corporate Water Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Universal Software Inc. -- FlexWater Corporate Water Management

item.title: CVE-2024-0857|2024-07-18T17:32:35.662Z -- universal%20software%20inc. -- flexwater%20corporate%20water%20management
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Universal Software Inc. FlexWater Corporate Water Management allows SQL Injection.This issue affects FlexWater Corporate Water Management: through 18072024.Â
NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
